Articles.Content: Hello fellow space cadets! My name is Jake and love this game. I\'ve been playing for a few weeks now and whenever I watch videos on youtube I always learn of some new feature in the game, especially flight aspect. Does anyone know of any youtube videos that can explain in detail how all the aspects of the game work, from building to flight and trajectories?

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hello fellow space cadets! My name is Jake and love this game. I\'ve been playing for a few weeks now and whenever I watch videos on youtube I always learn of some new feature in the game, especially flight aspect. Does anyone know of any youtube videos that can explain in detail how all the aspects of the game work, from building to flight and trajectories?

Try Kurt\'s channel (kurtjmac on youtube, far lands or bust - hard to miss), as he has a tendency to mess up things more than e.g. Scott Manely and other properly educated posters. Also, don\'t forget to surf on the forum, it has a lot of useful threads.
